text: Soni (kumbuchilani) katema kajwasunjisye ngani Ntume ﷺ kwa ŵamo mwa achiŵammakwakwe (Hafswa رضي الله عنهم), basi ndema ja ŵaajijuwile (asilijo kwa Aisha رضي الله عنهم), Allah ni kummanyisya (Ntume ﷺ) yalakweyo, (Ntume ﷺ) jwatagulile (Hafswa رضي الله عنهم) upande wine wanganijo nambo upande wine jwaulesile, basi ndema jajwatagulile yalakweyo (Hafswa رضي الله عنهم) ŵatite: “Ŵani ŵantagulile yele?” (Ntume ﷺ) jwatite: “Andagulile (Allah) Jwakumanyilila nnope, Jwaasimanya abali syosope.”
